title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1158.9 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1158.9 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information

State Regulations
(a) Denial
of a request for records or amendment or correction of a record or personal
information: (1)
shall be in writing, explaining the reasons therefor; and
(2)
identifying the person to whom an appeal
may be directed. (b) A
failure to grant or deny access to records within five business days of the
receipt of a request or within 30 days of an acknowledgment or the receipt of a
request, or a failure to respond to a request for amendment or correction of a
record within 30 business days of receipt of such a request, shall be construed
as a denial that may be appealed. (c) Any such denial may be appealed to: Chairman

Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority
181 Ellicott Street

Buffalo, NY 14203

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
